channel.title: Randolph County Emergency Squad, Inc. | Elkins WV | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Randolph-County-Emergency-Squad-Inc-100069807847256/

item.title: First day of school for our future Randolph Co. EMS paramedi
item.description: First day of school for our future Randolph Co. EMS paramedics!!!! Sent them with breakfast so they can be ready to start their class today and made them take a picture!! They are all smiles this morning!! Good luck to you all!! Robbie, Lucy, Chuck, John and Kyleigh, you all got this!!!

item.title: Many prayers for Kanawha County EMS and all of Kori’s family
item.description: Many prayers for Kanawha County EMS and all of Kori’s family and friends. Mental health is not a joke and needs to be made known that it’s ok to not feel ok. It’s ok to get help or talk to someone. Most of the time there isn’t any signs, because the person doesn’t want anyone to know. We hope Kori found the peace she needed. Rest in peace, Kori.
